thread_replies.author: VercTV
thread_replies.text:
Y'all want a chill stream, free of fake reactions, rage bait and bs? Tired of flashing lights and annoying sounds?

Hi, I am the Verc! Tune in on my Twitch for plenty of tactics and stealth gameplay, camaraderie, and goofy good vibes. No rage/bs, here!

　COMING 2026
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿◢

thread_replies.author: Kazutoki Kono : 河野一聡
thread_replies.text:
One year ago, we decided with the team to debut at this place. We've finally made it. And we've completed the biggest project of this year. This is dedicated to all the fans who believed in us and continued to support us.

Please look forward to ACE COMBAT 8: WINGS OF THEVE!

thread_replies.author: かまいるか
thread_replies.text:
The clouds in Escon 8  
I thought it had way higher density and more variety than 7, which was using trueSKY, and turns out they developed and are using their own in-house Cloudly that's specialized just for cloud rendering  
Man, I wanna fly soon

thread_replies.author: Leonid Afremov
thread_replies.text:
Artist Leonid Afremov passed away on August 19, 2019. 
Now the Afremov family is liquidating the remaining oil painting collection. 
Prices start at $129. Free shipping. We guarantee fast shipping before the holidays. 
Many thanks for your support

thread_replies.author: たまご
thread_replies.text:
Escon, it's a series that never really piqued my interest until now, but with the adoption of UE5 (probably), the texture quality around the aircraft carrier has improved so much that it looks enjoyable as a naval enlistment sim, and now I feel like playing it
ㅤ
ACE COMBAT 8

おはようございます

自己肯定感が高い人はすぐに行動に移すけど、自己肯定感が低い人は才能を求めがち。成功してる人達は特別な物を持っていると思うかもしれないけれど、それだけで成功している訳では無い。
自分に出来る範囲でしっかり行動に移していこ!!

tweets.author: かまいるか
tweets.text: しかしまぁトップガンマーベリックでえらいエスコンみたいなミッションするやんとお思ったらエスコン８でらえらいトップガンマーベリックみたいな撮り方するやんで応酬始めてるのホンマ好き

tweets.author: 里
tweets.text: I want ZERO as a reservation bonus for Escon 8! (Greedy)

tweets.author: Cloaked Wireless
tweets.text: Dude thought he was secure. Hardware wallet. 2FA. Strong passwords. But his phone number? Sitting on a carrier that hands SIM swaps to ‘anyone who sounds confident on the phone.’ Hacker calls in, ‘Hey I lost my phone.’ Boom – SIM swap approved.

tweets.author: 桐花しろる,セルフ受肉VTuber/シロル
tweets.text:
Thank you for watching!
It was so much fun getting all excited together while talking about games~!
The new games that caught my interest are The Forest 3, Bio 9, the new Tomb Raider, and Esca 8, I think!
Congratulations to Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 for winning 9 awards

tweets.author: かまいるか
tweets.text:
Escon 8
The shadows of your own ship and the enemy ships falling onto the clouds, and there's even the Brocken phenomenon, that's insanely intense

thread_replies.author: かまいるか
thread_replies.text:
The clouds in Escon 8  
I thought it had way higher density and more variety than 7, which was using trueSKY, and turns out they developed and are using their own in-house Cloudly that's specialized just for cloud rendering  
Man, I wanna fly soon

thread_replies.author: GTFO | 10 Chambers
thread_replies.text: Try this hardcore cooperative horror shooter that throws you from gripping suspense to explosive action in a heartbeat. Survival isn't guaranteed. Now 65% off on Steam!

thread_replies.text:

Popular flight shooting game developed by Bandai Namco Entertainment. Scheduled for release in 2026 on PC, PS5, and Xbox Series X|S

thread_replies.author: エースコンバット公式
thread_replies.text:
【#ACE8 Official Website Now Live!】
#AceCombat The official website for the latest installment in the series, "ACE COMBAT 8: WINGS OF THEVE™," has been launched.
Please enjoy the story and highlights of this title.

thread_replies.author: ファミ通.com
thread_replies.text:
『Ace Combat 8 Wings of THEVE』Set for Release in 2026

Confirmed scenes include the red wings emblem and walking inside an aircraft carrier from a first-person perspective
https://famitsu.com/article/202512/60353…

Bandai Namco's latest flight shooting game. Platforms: PS5 / Xbox Series X|S /

thread_replies.author: Kazutoki Kono : 河野一聡
thread_replies.text:
One year ago, we decided with the team to debut at this place. We've finally made it. And we've completed the biggest project of this year. This is dedicated to all the fans who believed in us and continued to support us.

Please look forward to ACE COMBAT 8: WINGS OF THEVE!
